name: NISessionDelegate
desc: An object that monitors and reacts to session updates.

items.name: func session(NISession, didUpdate: [NINearbyObject])
items.desc: Notifies you when the session updates nearby objects.

items.name: func session(NISession, didGenerateShareableConfigurationData: Data, for: NINearbyObject)
items.desc: Provides configuration data to share with a third-party accessory.

items.name: func session(NISession, didRemove: [NINearbyObject], reason: NINearbyObject.RemovalReason)
items.desc: Notifies you when the session removes one or more nearby objects.

items.name: enum NINearbyObject.RemovalReason
items.desc: The reason a session removed a nearby object.

items.name: func sessionWasSuspended(NISession)
items.desc: Notifies you of a suspended session.

items.name: func sessionSuspensionEnded(NISession)
items.desc: Notifies you of the end of a session's suspension.

items.name: func session(NISession, didInvalidateWith: Error)
items.desc: Notifies you of an invalidated session.

items.name: enum NIError.Code
items.desc: Codes that identify errors in Nearby Interaction.

items.name: let NIErrorDomain: String
items.desc: A unique error domain for Nearby Interaction.
